job_description:
• Process Optimization/Development experience preferred within the Wets Process space in the semiconductor industry At least 3 years of related experience as a Wets Process Engineer in the Semiconductor Industry.
• 5+ years of related experience as a Wets Process Engineer in the Semiconductor Industry.
• Support new process baseline qualifications and ensure alignment with sister fabs.
• Bachelor’s degree in related field or equivalent experience Experience with Screen DNS, LAM, TEL preferred Ability to travel occasionally.
• NTI NAND Senior/Principal Process Integration EngineerSingapore, SingaporePosted 2 months ago Lead process, equipment, and material evaluations and implement changes at the process step.
• NTI NAND Senior/Principal Process Integration EngineerSingapore, SingaporePosted a month ago.
